org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.units

Class ResourceBundleCompilationUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.units.CompilationUnitBase
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.units.ResourceBundleCompilationUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICompilationUnit

    public class ResourceBundleCompilationUnit
extends CompilationUnitBase
    This is a compilation unit that handles .properties file compilation.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Field Detail

      • LOCALE

        public static final String LOCALE
        Parent folder name for properties files in a swc. We read properties files off of this folder while reading a swc and copy them into this folder while writing a swc.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResourceBundleCompilationUnit

        public ResourceBundleCompilationUnit(CompilerProject project,
                             String path,
                             DefinitionPriority.BasePriority basePriority,
                             String qname,
                             String locale)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        project - project this compilation unit is associated with
        path - path of the properties file
        basePriority - base priority
        qname - qualified name for the properties file that will be processed by this comp unit
        locale - the locale this compilation unit depends on or null if the compilation unit is not locale dependent

      • ResourceBundleCompilationUnit

        public ResourceBundleCompilationUnit(CompilerProject project,
                             ISWCFileEntry fileEntry,
                             String qname,
                             String locale)
        Constructor. This constructor should be used for properties files that come from a swc.
        Parameters:
        project - project this compilation unit is associated with
        fileEntry - swc entry for the properties file that will be processed by this compilation unit
        qname - qualified name for the properties file that will be processed by this comp unit
        locale - the locale this compilation unit depends on or null if the compilation unit is not locale dependent

    • Method Detail

      • getCompilationUnitType

        public ICompilationUnit.UnitType getCompilationUnitType()
        Returns:
        the compilation unit type

      • getBundleNameInColonSyntax

        public String getBundleNameInColonSyntax()
        Returns the name of the bundle processed by this compilation unit. Bundle name is the qualified name that is used when referencing this bundle in action script. For qualified names, "colon syntax" is used such as foo.bar:xyz for "../foo/bar/xyz.properties" file.
        Returns:
        the name of the bundle processed by this compilation unit

      • getLocale

        public String getLocale()
        Returns the locale of the properties file associated with this compilation unit depends on or null if the file is not locale dependent.
        Returns:
        the locale this compilation unit depends on or null if the compilation unit is not locale dependent.

      • handleSyntaxTreeRequest

        protected ISyntaxTreeRequestResult handleSyntaxTreeRequest()
                                                    throws InterruptedException
        Description copied from class: CompilationUnitBase
        Builds a ISyntaxTreeRequestResult. In many cases the ISyntaxTreeRequestResult is built by parsing a source file into a syntax tree.

        Called by this class from potentially any thread. This class guarantees that this method will only be entered from one thread at a time for a given instance of this class, so implementations do not need to make this a synchronized method.

        Specified by:
        handleSyntaxTreeRequest in class CompilationUnitBase
        Returns:
        The ISyntaxTreeRequestResult for this compilation unit.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • handleFileScopeRequest

        protected IFileScopeRequestResult handleFileScopeRequest()
                                                  throws InterruptedException
        Description copied from class: CompilationUnitBase
        Builds a IFileScopeRequestResult. In many cases the IFileScopeRequestResult is built by walking an AST produced by a parser.

        Called by this class from potentially any thread. This class guarantees that this method will only be entered from one thread at a time for a given instance of this class, so implementations do not need to make this a synchronized method.

        Specified by:
        handleFileScopeRequest in class CompilationUnitBase
        Returns:
        The IFileScopeRequestResult for this compilation unit.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • handleABCBytesRequest

        protected IABCBytesRequestResult handleABCBytesRequest()
                                                throws InterruptedException
        Description copied from class: CompilationUnitBase
        Builds a IABCBytesRequestResult. In many cases the IABCBytesRequestResult is built running a code generator over an AST produced by a parser.

        Called by this class from potentially any thread. This class guarantees that this method will only be entered from one thread at a time for a given instance of this class, so implementations do not need to make this a synchronized method.

        Specified by:
        handleABCBytesRequest in class CompilationUnitBase
        Returns:
        The IABCBytesRequestResult for this compilation unit.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • handleSWFTagsRequest

        protected ISWFTagsRequestResult handleSWFTagsRequest()
                                              throws InterruptedException
        Description copied from class: CompilationUnitBase
        Builds a ISWFTagsRequestResult. In many cases the ISWFTagsRequestResult is built getting the IABCBytesRequestResult and wrapping its abc bytes in a DoABCTag.

        Called by this class from potentially any thread. This class guarantees that this method will only be entered from one thread at a time for a given instance of this class, so implementations do not need to make this a synchronized method.

        Specified by:
        handleSWFTagsRequest in class CompilationUnitBase
        Returns:
        The ISWFTagsRequestResult for this compilation unit.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • waitForBuildFinish

        public void waitForBuildFinish(Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems,
                      ITarget.TargetType targetType)
                        throws InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: ICompilationUnit
        Wait till the compilation unit finishes building, and collect compiler problems. After calling this method, this compilation unit will be in a fully compiled state.
        Specified by:
        waitForBuildFinish in interface ICompilationUnit
        Overrides:
        waitForBuildFinish in class CompilationUnitBase
        Parameters:
        problems - Problems from executing the requests.
        targetType - type of the active Target
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - Concurrency error.
        See Also:
        ICompilationUnit.startBuildAsync(org.apache.flex.compiler.targets.ITarget.TargetType)

      • startBuildAsync

        public void startBuildAsync(ITarget.TargetType targetType)
        Description copied from interface: ICompilationUnit
        This method starts to build the compilation unit asynchronously. It kicks off all the request methods on the compilation unit.
        Specified by:
        startBuildAsync in interface ICompilationUnit
        Overrides:
        startBuildAsync in class CompilationUnitBase
        Parameters:
        targetType - type of the active Target

      • getFileLastModified

        public long getFileLastModified()
        Get the time-stamp of the properties file processed by this compilation unit.
        Returns:
        time stamp in milliseconds from epoch time.

      • getFileContent

        public byte[] getFileContent(Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
        Returns the content of the file processed by this compilation unit.
        Returns:
        byte array that represents the content or null if any problem occurs.
